properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM M/V ALARRIBA
   IN 25-31.45S 045-29.23W AT 090253Z JUL.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
   TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1517/12(35,43), STATION RESTORED.
